home.description: Manage money digitally in a group with H-Bank.
home.description-long: Never forget pocket money again! H-Bank allows you to manage pocket money and the like completely cashlessly. Transfer money to other users in your group or create automatic payment plans and view your payment history years later.

dashboard.invitations: You received no new invitations… | You received one new invitation… | You received {count} new invitations…

confirm-email.title: Confirm email
confirm-email.instructions: We have sent you a code by email. Please check your inbox (spam too) and enter it below:

activate-two-fa.title: Activate two-factor-auth
activate-two-fa.instructions-qr: Please scan the qr code with an authenticator app (e.g. Google Authenticator).
activate-two-fa.instructions-key: Alternatively, you can manually enter the above code into the authenticator app.

new-recovery-codes.title: Recovery codes
new-recovery-codes.instructions: Please write down the following codes and keep them in a secure location. If you ever lose access to your authenticator app, you will be able to recover your account using one of the codes below.

group-settings.title: Group settings
group-settings.leave-description: This doesn't change your admin status. All payment plans will be deleted. Your past transactions will be kept.
group-settings.demote-description: You will lose the right to control the bank and manage members.
group-settings.delete-description: The group will be irrevocably deleted.
group-settings.remove-picture-warning: The group picture will be removed.

payment-plan-details.title: Details
payment-plan-details.delete-dialog-description: The payment plan will be irrevocably deleted.

members-list.promotion-dialog-description: Do you want to promote this user? Admins can manage the bank and invite or promote other users.

account.title: Account settings
account.new-otp-warning: The codes of your current device won't be valid anymore.
account.new-recovery-codes-warning: Your current recovery codes won't be valid anymore.
account.delete-warning: The account and all of its data will be irrevocably deleted!
account.change-email-success: We sent a change email to the new address.
account.remove-picture-warning: The profile picture will be removed.

forgot-password.title: Forgot password
forgot-password.sent: A reset email was sent to the specified address.
